ygData.subject: CVSGrab with Heritrix
ygData.msgSnippet: I m trying to use CVSGrab as suggested at http://crawler.archive.org/cvs-usage.html for accessing CVS projects behind a firewall. I m running cvsgrab 2.2.2

Subject: CVSGrab with Heritrix
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=234926651; y=0AQkL398VrFMnaQZV7VwXYR09S_RNW2geRwYz5lQg7RmtA
X-Yahoo-Profile: mccownf

I'm trying to use CVSGrab as suggested at

http://crawler.archive.org/cvs-usage.html

for accessing CVS projects behind a firewall.

I'm running cvsgrab 2.2.2 (latest) on Win XP Pro:

cvsgrab.bat -cvsRoot 
:pserver:anonymous@...:/cvsroot/archive-crawler
-rootUrl http://archive-crawler.cvs.sourceforge.net/archive-crawler/ 
-packagePath ArchiveOpenCrawler -destDir e:\Projects\heritrix

Here's the begninning of the output:

CVSGrab version 2.2.2 starting...
Tried to connect to the following urls:
cvsroot
http://archive-crawler.cvs.sourceforge.net/archive-crawler/
http://archive-crawler.cvs.sourceforge.net/archive-crawler/ArchiveOpenCrawler/
Problems found during automatic detection:
ViewCvs0_7 tried to match page 
http://archive-crawler.cvs.sourceforge.net/archive-crawler/ArchiveOpenCrawler/ 
but found error Expected marker ViewCVS 0.7, found  null
... etc...
Could not detect the type of the web interface

Apparently cvsgrab is not finding what it wants in the given web page.

Am I giving the wrong arguments, or is there a problem with cvsgrab that 
should be reported?

Thanks,
Frank
